name: Master of the Blocks
description:
As you open your eyes you see the wall of blocks. A myriad of colors affronting your being and you decide - "It all must become one. It all must become me".

But wait... there are others... and they have the same goal! You will have to be quick to outrun, out claim... and become the master of the blocks!

Game Play

Claim as many of the blocks in the wall as you can with 15 turns. 
Each turn you can only do one action:
- Move to an adjacent block of your own color
- or claim an adjacent color.
Either can be done by clicking on the adjacent block.
Enemy blocks cannot be claimed.

Submission for Trijam #204 Theme: "Blocked"
